message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase.
I understand you're looking for a deal, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $115? It's a fair price considering the value you'll be getting.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
